item.title: Papers
item.description:
[!NOTE]

This page is used to store the papers that hasn’t been finished and the finished one.

Reading

KAN

Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks, the interesting view is the learning of activation function, which archive the thought of Learning every parameters of neural network. And it reveal the route to the symbolism.

Link

Adagrad

A detailed view to the creation of optimizer, a foundation for the subsequent optimizers.

Link

Finished

CA-TCC

Using contrastive learning technique and well-designed tasks for better representation learning in the paradigm of Unsupervised Learning.

item.title: about
item.description:
This is the Information Page for this blog and for myself.

Introduction to myself

I am a junior student from mathematic school of Sun Yat-Sen University, major in Mathematic and Applied Mathematic. My future development interest is in the theoretical field in deep learning. I am working on a Battery SOH Estimation Project these days(Started from June 2024), and a overview of a working process has been mastered. A simple dive into the source code of a standard library can be achieved by myself.
